	1.	Fully functional metrics dashboard in Notion.

job_title: Ai Bot, Crypto Trading
job_description:
Project Overview: Advanced Cryptocurrency Futures Trading AI Bot

I am looking to develop an advanced AI-powered cryptocurrency futures trading bot capable of achieving a target accuracy rate of 65%-75% in predicting trades. The bot will use a combination of machine learning models, sentiment analysis, and technical analysis to make informed trading decisions, execute trades automatically, and manage risks effectively. The bot should operate in real-time and integrate with major cryptocurrency exchanges via APIs.

Key Features and Functionalities
1. Core Objectives
Analyse market trends and predict price movements with an accuracy target of 65%-75%.
Execute trades in the cryptocurrency futures market based on the predictions.
Manage risks effectively through stop-loss, take-profit, and position sizing strategies.
Include a feedback loop to optimise and improve trading strategies over time.

2. Key Components
Data Collection and Integration:

Collect real-time market data (price, volume, order book data) from cryptocurrency exchanges like Binance, Coinbase, or Bybit.

Access historical data for model training and backtesting.
Incorporate sentiment analysis by scraping news sources, Twitter, Reddit, and other platforms for relevant market sentiment.

Machine Learning Model:

Use advanced AI models such as LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory), Reinforcement Learning, or other deep learning approaches.
Combine these with technical indicators (e.g., RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands) for a hybrid approach.
Train the model on historical data to predict price movements and generate trade signals.

Sentiment Analysis:

Implement NLP (Natural Language Processing) models to assess market sentiment from news and social media.
Use pre-trained models like Transformers (BERT, GPT) or custom-trained sentiment models.
Incorporate sentiment data as an additional feature for the trading model.

Trading Strategies:

Focus on trend-following and swing trading strategies for high-probability setups.
Include multi-timeframe analysis to improve trade reliability.
Design strategies with a focus on a risk-to-reward ratio of at least 1:2 or 1:3.

Risk Management:

Automatically set stop-loss and take-profit levels based on predefined parameters.
Manage leverage to minimise risk, particularly in volatile markets.
Incorporate position sizing algorithms to optimise capital allocation.

Backtesting and Simulation:

Allow for backtesting on historical data to evaluate the performance of strategies.
Include a paper trading mode to test the bot in real-time without risking actual funds.

Execution Engine:

Integrate with cryptocurrency exchanges via their APIs for trade execution.
Ensure low-latency trading to capture the best prices.

Monitoring and Alerts:

Provide a dashboard for monitoring live performance, account balance, and open trades.
Send alerts for significant events (e.g., margin calls, large losses) via email, SMS, or app notifications.

Feedback Loop:

Implement a feedback mechanism to refine the model based on performance over time.
Log trade outcomes and use the data to retrain the AI for improved accuracy.
Technical Requirements
1. Programming Language and Frameworks
Language: Python (preferred) or other suitable languages for AI development.
AI Frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn for machine learning.
Data Analysis: Pandas, NumPy.
Sentiment Analysis: Hugging Face Transformers, NLTK, SpaCy.
2. API Integration
Integrate with major exchanges like Binance, Bybit, or Coinbase using their REST/WebSocket APIs.
Ensure secure handling of API keys and account credentials.
3. Cloud and Deployment
Host the bot on a cloud platform (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) for scalability and 24/7 availability.
Use containers like Docker for easy deployment and scalability.
4. Database
Use a robust database (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB) to store historical data, trade logs, and AI model states.
5. Security
Implement encryption for API keys and sensitive data.
Ensure the bot is resistant to external threats (e.g., DDOS attacks, unauthorised access).

Expectations and Deliverables
1. Deliverables
A fully functional AI trading bot with all requested features.
A user-friendly dashboard for monitoring performance and making adjustments.
Backtesting reports to validate the model’s accuracy and profitability.
Comprehensive documentation for the bot’s architecture, algorithms, and user guide.

2. Accuracy Metrics
The AI should achieve a prediction accuracy of 65%-75% in testing and backtesting scenarios.
Include logs and metrics to evaluate the accuracy in live trading conditions.

3. Timeline
I am open to discussing the development timeline, but I expect milestones to include:
Initial prototype with basic functionality.
Advanced model with sentiment analysis and full backtesting capabilities.
Finalised bot with live trading and monitoring.
Budget and Communication
I am willing to discuss the budget based on the scope and complexity of the project.
Regular communication and progress updates (e.g., weekly meetings, reports) are essential.
Open to iterative development to test features as they are implemented.

Final Notes
The key focus is on building a robust, accurate, and secure AI trading bot that can operate in volatile cryptocurrency markets. I am looking for a developer with expertise in AI/ML, cryptocurrency trading, and API integrations. If you have any suggestions or think certain aspects of the project could be improved, I am open to collaboration.
